title: Lady Macbeth
summary: Lady Macbeth is a leading character in William Shakespeare's tragedy Macbeth (c.1603â€“1607). As the wife of the play's tragic hero, Macbeth (a Scottish nobleman), Lady Macbeth goads her husband into committing regicide, after which she becomes queen of Scotland. After Macbeth becomes a murderous tyrant, she is driven to madness by guilt over their crimes, and commits suicide offstage.
